page.title: 09Attitudes of Wilton People
page.content: The majority of people living and working in Wilton appear to be very contented. They like the atmosphere and friendliness of the town. Most of their needs are catered for , with first and middle schools, churches for different religious beliefs and local industries. The main criticism is that there are not enough shops. The children in Wilton largely attend the local schools and although they like the town they would like to see changes. More shops and more facilities for leisure would greatly improve the town in their opinion. The overall impression given is that people who live in Wilton are very contented with their town and surroundings.
